content: SECTION 1. AMENDMENTS RELATING TO THE CIVIL SERVICE RETIREMENT SYSTEM. Section 1 amends the Civil Service Retirement System. A new section 8335a terminates retirement coverage for Members of Congress, with no further contributions or deductions allowed. The new section 8335a terminates retirement coverage for Members of Congress, with no further contributions allowed. This does not affect any prior rights or eligibility for the Thrift Savings Plan. Additionally, subsection (a) does not impact a Member's right to participate in the Thrift Savings Plan according to applicable laws. Regulations for this section may be issued by the Director of the Office of Personnel Management. The Director of the Office of Personnel Management may prescribe regulations for section 8335a, except for matters related to the Thrift Savings Plan, which will be prescribed by the Executive Director.
